claim: no game be play when the goal for be less than 30

The claim states: "no game be play when the goal for be less than 30". This implies that every team should have a "goals for" value of at least 30.

Every team has scored at least 30 goals. Therefore, there are no instances where a "goals for" value is less than 30.

Since the condition of the claim holds true across all teams in the table, we conclude that the claim is TRUE.
